JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Chemical technician needed at garbage facility in Nyborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Description

You will be a part of a team of friendly and professional colleagues, where you can be responsible for administrating and planning the facility warehouse at one of the biggest garbage sortments in Denmark.

Tasks:

Your job will be to prepare the mixing of different materials and chemicals, which will be mixed into containers and transported around the facility.

Shortly said, your job is to make sure things don't go KABOOM - by finding the right chemicals and how these can be mixed in a safe way to be transported.

Professional qualifications:

  • Past experience with similar jobs; such as chemical engineer or laboratory work
  • Preferably experience with warehouse work

Personal qualifications:

Looking for somebody who is:

  • structured with eyes for details
  • Good at working with other people

Further details:

Pay starts at 181kr. per hour

Is this the job for you?

Apply by sending your CV to dfi@jobteam.dk.

You can also call at 75527550 (key 1) if you have further questions
